title: Shark Rocket Ultra Light Hand Vacuum Cleaner and Car Detail Kit and 15-Foot Power Cord Hand Vacuum (Renewed)
features: CLEAN ANYWHERE: Navigate smoothly around furniture, corners and other obstacles by simply using the flexible hose attachment for the cleaning tools to reach the tight spaces.
POWERFUL SUCTION: The portable and lightweight handheld vacuum never loses suction and can extended your cleaning time with the 1.2 Quart dirt and debris capacity

EASY TO USE: Easy to lift, carry and move around at less than 4 pounds with cord and tools and features a 15-foot power cord for reachability. The dust cup container is easy to empty with a push of a button

ALL FLOOR TYPES: Move from carpet to furniture with the easy to carry Shark Rocket hand vacuum with handheld deep cleaning, loose debris, and pet hair making it great for stairs, car interiors, and furniture
Includes Handheld vacuum, pet multi-tool, flexible hose, duster crevice tool, home and car detail kit, and accessory bag
description: The Shark Rocket Ultra Light hand vacuum is the one to grab for simple, daily cleaning tasks. Weighing under four pounds, this lightweight little crumb eater gobbles up gunk and debris -- including pet hair. Thanks to its corded design, you'll experience powerful suction that just doesn't quit. Use the varied attachments plus the detailing kit to eradicate dirt from both easy- and hard-to-reach areas around your home and auto: everything from snacks spilled beneath seats to those tiny bits of gravel that seemingly migrate from shoe soles to floor mats. Then quickly dispose of the collected dirt and debris by emptying the dust cup. From Shark. Includes Handheld vacuum, pet multi-tool, flexible hose, duster crevice tool, home and car detail kit, and accessory bag Easy empty dust cup Measurements: Vacuum 8.5" x 13.5" x 5", weighs 3.7 lbs; Cord 15'L UL listed
